      Parameters:
      selectionIndex - the index of the selected order in the list

    • addNewFood

      public void addNewFood()

    • placeOrder

      public void placeOrder()
      Tries to close the current order and adds it to the order history. The order will be closed only if it contains at least one pizza. If the order doesn't contain at least one pizza, the order is not closed.
